pr_title: [2.19.x] DDF-5724 G-2115 fixes issue with basic search form when there are no facets

timeline.message: DDF-5724 G-2115 fixes issue with basic search form when there are no facets

timeline.bodyText: ❓ Can getValue() return an empty array?
timeline.author: mojogitoverhere
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -543,7 +543,10 @@ module.exports = Marionette.LayoutView.extend({
     }
 
     const types = this.basicType.currentView.model.getValue()[0]
-    const specificTypes = this.basicTypeSpecific.currentView.model.getValue()[0]
+    const specificTypes =
+      this.basicTypeSpecific.currentView.model !== undefined
+        ? this.basicTypeSpecific.currentView.model.getValue()[0]

replies.bodyText: i think the only way that could happen is if someone entered an empty string in the catalog ui search config
replies.author: bdeining
